name: Mass Welfare Society
briefDescription: Mass Welfare Society does the following activities :-Provides basic education to around 600 marginalised slum children (in 10 Praparatory Schools in different slums of Kolkata) and prepares them for mainstreaming into the formal education system.Mainstreams around 200 slum children every year into Formal Schools.Provides tuition support to around 200 school-going children of the slum areas (in 4 evening Coaching Centres).Provides daily nutrition to around 600 children attending the Preparatory Schools.Organises Health Check-up Camps for around 800 children (every centre once every month), monitors their health and provides free medicines.Organises recreational activities outings, educational tours, children's cultural festival, sit & draw competitions, and celebration of special days like Children's Day, International Girl Child Day, Independence Day, Rabindra Jayanti etc.Provides a new set of clothes to around 800 children every year during the festive season.Conducts regular meetings with parents, specially mothers and other members of the local community to get their feedback, suggestions and recommendations.Organises Awareness Programmes for people of the local community and local key stakeholders on issues like Health & Hygiene, Child Rights, RTE, Women's Rights, Abuse and Exploitation of children, Gender Discrimination, Violence against women, Trafficking, Literacy,Environment etc.Provides vocational skills training to around 100 women and adolescent girls in the trades of Embroidery, Tailoring, Doll- Making, Soft Toy-Making, Flower-Making, Mehendi Design etc. to make them earning members of their families.
